com.umeng.common.ui.adapters

类 CommonAdapter<T,H extends ViewParser>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.umeng.common.ui.adapters.CommonAdapter<T,H>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter
    直接已知子类:
    ActiveUserAdapter, BackupAdapter, CategoryAdapter, FeedAdapter, FeedCommentAdapter, FeedImageAdapter, FeedImageAdapter, FollowedUserAdapter, FollowedUserAdapter, ImagePickerGvAdapter, ImageSelectedAdapter, LikeUserAdapter, MessageChatAdapter, MessageSessionAdapter, NotifyAdapter, PickerAdapter, ReceivedCommentAdapter, SelectTopicAdapter, TopicPickerAdater, UserAdapter

    public abstract class CommonAdapter<T,H extends ViewParser>
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    通用的Adapter，实现了getCount、getItem等方法,以及封装了getView的逻辑
